name: SW16BR2 “Sawbuck” Repeater
name_cn: SW16BR2 "锯木架" 实弹速射炮
description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Ballistic Repeater
Size: 2
The SW16BR2 Sawbuck is Behring’s contribution to the expanding Ballistic Repeater market. Its sequential-firing double barrel configuration offers an effective middle-ground for operators looking for a higher rate of fire than a cannon, but without the fear of overheating that you would get with a gatling.
description_cn:
制造商：贝林财团(Behring)
物品类型：实弹速射炮
尺寸：2
SW16BR2锯木机实弹速射炮是贝林财团对不断扩大的实弹速射炮市场的贡献。它的顺序射击双枪管结构为寻求比加农炮更高的射速的操作员提供了有效的中间条件，但又不用担心转式枪管会造成过热。

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-微科星(microTech)-新巴贝奇(New Babbage)-Centermass
